title._content: [Major Thomas B. Beall of Company I, 10th Mississippi Infantry Regiment with bayoneted musket, with two stars in case] (LOC)

description._content: [Major Thomas B. Beall of Company I, 10th Mississippi Infantry Regiment with bayoneted musket, with two stars in case] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : quarter-plate ambrotype, hand-colored ; 12.6 x 10.4 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Berg, no. 3-41. Deposit; Tom Liljenquist; 2012; (2010:105-5) Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress).
